name: Turning Opportunities for Upliftment and Child Help
briefDescription: TOUCH takes care of educational needs of under privileged children mainly from the rural area and urban slums area. As of now, TOUCH has around 1800 children who are benefiting from our various educational schemes. Needless to mention, such activities need strong monetary support to achieve the set goals. Through various innovative activities TOUCH volunteers mobilize the funds which take care of the childrenâ€™s basic education and rehabilitation of destitute children
